title: Italian Braised Cod
directions: In a large frying pan, heat oil over medium heat. Saut√© onions and garlic in olive oil until softened.
Stir in tomatoes, olives, parsley and wine. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Place fillets in sauce. Simmer for about 5 more minutes, or until fish turns white.
ingredients: 75g (3 oz) black olives, pitted and sliced
